tool_description: Calculates key performance indicators for technician scheduling including utilization rates, response times, customer satisfaction metrics, and operational efficiency scores.

sla_targets.description: SLA response time targets in hours

include_travel_metrics.description: Whether to include travel efficiency metrics

customer_satisfaction_threshold.description: Minimum customer rating for satisfaction (1-5 scale)

error_messages: Invalid date range: calculation_period_start must be before calculation_period_end
Invalid job data format: Use 'job_id:technician_id:scheduled_start:actual_start:duration:customer_rating' format
Invalid satisfaction threshold: Must be between 1.0 and 5.0
Insufficient data: Need at least one completed job and schedule entry
usage: Provide completed job data and schedule information to calculate comprehensive performance metrics for technician scheduling effectiveness.

sla_compliance_rate.description: Percentage of jobs meeting SLA targets

schedule_adherence_rate.description: Percentage of jobs completed on schedule
